overview:
Roman is the owner of SoftFinity Corporation

SoftFinity is a worldwide service provider bringing business-driven technical solutions that meet or exceed the clientâ€™s expectations. Founded in 1993, it produces number of practical solutions around specific needs of industries. The company structured around Centers Of Excellence that embark upon various industries, such as Automotive, Banking and Insurance.

SoftFinity delivers supreme business values to customers through a blend of using best practices, employing Service Oriented Architecture, adopting Open Standards, applying Governance Models, choosing applicable Management Methodologies, deployng under Software As A Service model, architecting with patterns and protecting and nurturing intellectual capital.
